thobe.widgets.splitPanel

Class SPComponentDecorator

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • thobe.widgets.decoratorPanel.DecoratorPanel
              • thobe.widgets.decoratorPanel.ProgressPanel
                • thobe.widgets.splitPanel.SPComponentDecorator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class SPComponentDecorator
extends ProgressPanel
implements java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener
    Panel which can be placed into a SplitPanel (as even any other Component), but this one is decorated with some useful things like:
    • a menubar with buttons for vertical-, horizontal-split, lock, close and maximize
    • a WaitingDecorator that visualizes the enable/ disable status of the panel and its subcomponents
    • a WaitingDecorator that can be used to visualize progress (spinning dial + progress bar)
    • a user defined menu-bar (bottom) for user defined actions
    Author:
    Thomas Obenaus
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setProgress

        public void setProgress(int progress)
        Description copied from class: ProgressPanel
        Set the value of the progress-bar of the ProgressPanel. Note that the progress-bar is only visible if the ProgressPanel is in state waiting and if the visibility of the progress bar was enabled via ProgressPanel.setWithProgressbar(boolean).
        Overrides:
        setProgress in class ProgressPanel

        public void setButtonEnabled(SPComponentDecoratorButtonType type,
                    boolean enabled)
        Enable/ disable a button of the SPComponentDecorators top menu-bar.
        Parameters:
        type - - defines which button should be affected by this method-call.
        enabled - - true -> enable, false -> disable the button
